div.p:
Lottery Registration for the Universal Prekindergarten Program
will be BY APPOINTMENT ONLY on:
TUESDAY, APRIL 28–THURSDAY APRIL 30, 2020
8:30 a.m. –2:30 p.m.
Central Administration
2650 Great Neck Road, Copiague
